colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @011A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI BLO GROS KYI 'JUG PA MCHOG TU YANGS PA'I DGE SLONG DKON MCHOG TSUL KHRIMS KYIS GRONG CHOG PA RNAMS KYI THUGS BZHED BSKONG PA'I SLAD DU BRI DGOS SU BSKUL BAR RTEN, SNYIGS DUS KYI MTHA' LA SLEB PAS RGYAL PO'I GNOD PA BOD PA'I DUS 'DIR 'GA' ZHIG LA PHAN PA'ANG SRID DAM SNYAM PAS RGYAL PO'I MDOS GZHUNG SOGS KHUNGS THUB RNAMS KYI DON DANG MI 'GAL BAR BSGRIGS PA PO NI DHARMA SVA MI WA GINDRA PA tU SIDDHI'I MING CAN NO, ,'DIS KYANG 'GRO BA RNAMS NGA RGYAL ZHE SDANG GIS BSKUL BA'I GNOD BYED KYI 'CHANG SGO SNA TSOGS LAS THAR BAR GYUR CIG ,SARBA MANGGA LAm, ,)
